# Useful Functions
Some generalised useful functions in R

## HTML output
**R-chunks arguments** 
```{r, eval=FALSE}
eval=FALSE
```
Prints the literal text, does not produce a computation


```{r eval=FALSE}
eval=FALSE #prints the literal text, does not produce a result.
echo=FALSE #prints the result only.
```
